crucialShotMedal.name: crucialShotMedal
crucialShotMedal.condition:
• Win the battle.
• Newly received awards are added together.
• Can be obtained in Team Battles only.
crucialShotMedal.description: In 20 battles, destroy the last enemy vehicle.

markOfMastery.name: markOfMastery

options.description:
Awarded for mastery in controlling an armored
vehicle. To qualify, a player must earn more
experience in a battle than the average highest
experience of 50% players who have fought
in this vehicle for the previous 7 days.

markOfMastery.condition:
• Statistics show the maximum rank
of mastery.
• A newly received current rank is displayed
in the battle results window.
• Can be obtained in Random Battles only.
markOfMastery.description:
Awarded for mastery in controlling an armored
vehicle. To qualify, a player must earn more
experience in a battle than the average highest
experience of 50% players who have fought
in this vehicle for the previous 7 days.
